item.title: Whisker Squadron: Survivor launches February 21 for PS5, PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/whisker-squadron-survivor-launches-february-21-for-ps5-pc

  • PC
  • PS5

Currently in Early Access for PC.

Roguelite shoot ’em up game Whisker Squadron: Survivor will leave Early Access and launch for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on February 21, developer Flippfly announced.

Whisker Squadron: Survivor first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on August 21, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via Flippfly:

About

An intense roguelike shooter from the creators of Race the Sun, featuring a voiced cast of feline characters known as Whisker Squadron.

Choose your ship and outfit it with your weapons of choice, then take the fight to The Swarm, a robotic army of robotic bugs controlled by a shadowy corporation.

Chart a course through a dynamic galaxy map across three acts, making tactical choices along the way to turn your ship into a finely tuned bot-killing machine.

Each randomized run is an opportunity to fight through wave upon wave of Swarm bots while honing your skills, getting to know your crewmates, and learning more about the mysterious origins of Whisker Squadron’s leader, Gigi. After each run, spend your earnings on permanent ship upgrades and unlockable weapons.

Key Features

  • Three distinct acts, each featuring unique enemies and boss fights.
  • Voiced cast of characters.
  • Three ships, seven weapons, and dozens of upgrades to choose from.
  • Unlock and complete more than two dozen Challenges to prove your skills.
  • Too easy for you? Choose from several unlockable mods to crank up the difficulty.
  • Several accessibility options to tune your experience.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer
